description: This Java source file defines a class 'MockAlarmCluster' that extends 'MockCluster'. It appears to be part of a testing or mocking framework for device clusters related to the Zigbee protocol, specifically for an alarm cluster. The class constructor calls the superclass constructor with specific parameters, indicating it represents an alarm cluster with certain properties.

classes.name: MockAlarmCluster
classes.description: A mock class representing an alarm cluster in a Zigbee device for testing purposes.

methods.name: MockAlarmCluster
methods.description: Constructor for MockAlarmCluster, initializes the mock cluster with specific parameters for an alarm cluster.
